I played this game for many hours both solo and with friends but this last update just pushed me over the edge. As a survivor main, about 75% of total game time, after the last update it's just the final stab in the heart that made me regret ever buying this game.

This game is so killer oriented it's not funny anymore. Playing as killer, I just feel toxic because it's so easy to ruin people's day just by being so overpowered without even trying. Survivor's hitboxes are so large you can hit them from triple the distance you realistically should be able to, instant-down abilities for some killers, many perks that show your location to killer; Barbecue & Chilli, Bitter Murmur, Nurse's Calling, Territorial Imperative and the endgame perk Blood Warden. Then there's perks and add-ons that give you the ability to insta-down survivors and on top of that there's the add-ons that show survivor locations to the killer, if you stack all of that or even just use a good combination you can almost wallhack your way through the game. 

For survivors, every good or decent perk gets nerfed or changed, healing/mending/repairing times get increased over many updates, it's just disgusting. Killers get reworked, perks changed and upgraded. It's very clear that the devs are listening more to killers than survivors and thereby ruining the game for survivor players.

Apart from the unbalanced gameplay, the game by itself is broken as well. When loading a match, the game will just suddenly freeze or crash, killers will disconnect and teammates will disconnect. Lobbies sometimes take half an hour or longer to fill because of a lobby bug, it's faster to disconnect and find a new one. 

I'm done, for me there's no more fun. It's not a game anymore, it's a frustrating chore. It was a big relief to finally uninstall this big pile of garbage.

топ игра
DBD - это когда ты не уверен, что страшнее - твои тиммейты или маньяк.

Игра интересная,первые часы немного страшная , потом ты начинаешь привыкать и входить в азарт пытаясь убежать от убийцы(выживший) или убить всех выживших как можно быстрее(маньяк).Игра понравилась еще на релизе и я следил за ней все время ее существования . Из минусов хотелось бы отметить очень токсичных игроков на высоких рангах и достаточно большое количество багов. Подводя итоги я бы сказал что игра подойдет не всем , потому что некоторым может наскучить довольно однообразный геймплей , но если взять с собой пару друзей то игра приобретает другие краски и играть становиться весело.Рекомендую

Dead by Daylight is something else. At the current moment, it is the only competitive game of freeze tag on steam and I have many hours on the ps4 version as both Survivor and Killer. On Ps4 and PC there are many issues that stem from the development standpoint; frame rate and many little issues with matchmaking. The community is alright, as such with any competitive game. It can be toxic. None the less it is enjoyable and a fun experience.

Bloodpoints. Bloodpoints are the name of the game and being a survivor earning them is like pulling teeth. Dailies, quest or archives are  grueling tasks to complete at times while killer side is something simple like hit a survivor a few time. Playing both sides of the game starting with survivor and now killer recently I can say the game is much more fun as the killer. You get more points per average a game than you would as a survivor with out the pain of teammates  and hit boxes designed to give killer advantages. Bottom line the game is not fun anymore as a survivor and in my opinion wont last much longer if the Devs don't change something. Edit and the new grade system has made the game even worse for matchmaking.

O jogo no geral é bem divertido. No começo ele te traz aquela atmosfera de terror, principalmente até acostumar com o que cada personagem faz, quais as melhores itens para se usar, e tal. Isso vai trazer mais segurança, alem de aprender a driblar o assassino. 

Unico problema desse jogo, é como a maioria de jogos online competitivos, é a comunidade, conforme você 'sobe' o rank, os players de ambos os lados ficam mais tóxicos e isso pode ser um problema.

Aconselho totalmente o jogo, principalmente com amigos, pois a experiência fica mais dinâmica e facilitada, alem de render boas risadas com sustos e vacilos dos amigos!! hahahahahaah

Un gran juego para jugar con amigos, las partidas por lo general varian mucho dependiendo del asesino que toque y como se den las diferentes situaciones, lo que hace que sea bastnte dinámico.
El único punto negativo del juego es que el Matchmaking tiene algunos problemas con el ping que hay en las partidas (ya que la misma parece que se juega directo en la PC del Asesino) y a veces toca salir de los lobby y volver a entrar, esto no es gran problema, salvo cuando se juega con amigos que hay que volver a invitarlos.
